CurrentStatuses.StatusDescription: All services are running normally with no reported issues.

PastIncidents.StatusDescription: We are currently experiencing degraded performance and potential major outages due to an Amazon AWS database issue affecting the us-east-1 region. Some bot commands and data services may be slow or unresponsive. Our team is monitoring the situation and will restore full functionality as soon as AWS resolves the regional outage.
Temporary VPS server crash was handled and the bot should now recieve uptime.
Temporary database connectivity issues affecting user verification and ranking systems.
All services will continue to be operational while we resolve any non-explicit copyright formats loaded on the bot.

A̶l̶l̶ ̶s̶e̶r̶v̶i̶c̶e̶s̶ ̶E̶X̶C̶E̶P̶T̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶/̶c̶o̶m̶m̶a̶n̶d̶s̶ ̶c̶o̶m̶m̶a̶n̶d̶ ̶c̶a̶t̶e̶g̶o̶r̶y̶ ̶'̶m̶i̶s̶c̶e̶l̶l̶a̶n̶e̶o̶u̶s̶'̶ ̶w̶i̶l̶l̶ ̶n̶o̶t̶ ̶b̶e̶ ̶f̶u̶n̶c̶t̶i̶o̶n̶a̶l̶ ̶u̶n̶t̶i̶l̶ ̶r̶e̶s̶o̶l̶v̶e̶d̶. The issue was successfully resolved
